name: Superhuman
description: Superhuman is an AI-powered email client designed to enhance productivity and streamline email management for professionals.
longDescription: Superhuman is a premium email client that leverages AI to help users manage their inboxes with unprecedented speed and efficiency. Its mission is to transform the email experience by reducing time spent on repetitive tasks and enabling users to focus on what matters most. Built for professionals, entrepreneurs, and teams, Superhuman integrates with popular email services like Gmail and Outlook, offering a sleek interface and powerful features. The platform uses AI to prioritize emails, suggest responses, and automate workflows, aiming to save users hours each week. By emphasizing speed, organization, and a distraction-free experience, Superhuman redefines how professionals interact with their email.
features: AI-powered email prioritization automatically surfaces the most important messages to ensure users focus on high-priority tasks first.
Split Inbox separates emails into actionable categories, streamlining workflow and reducing inbox clutter.
Snippets allow users to create reusable templates for quick, consistent responses to common email queries.
Instant Reply Suggestions use AI to provide context-aware response options, speeding up email composition.
Keyboard shortcuts enable lightning-fast navigation and email management for power users.
Read Status tracking shows when recipients open emails, helping users time follow-ups effectively.
Snooze functionality lets users temporarily hide emails and resurface them at a more convenient time.
Calendar integration allows seamless scheduling of meetings directly within the email interface.
Undo Send gives users a brief window to retract emails, preventing costly mistakes.
Team collaboration tools enable shared inboxes and real-time updates for coordinated workflows.
Insights provide analytics on email habits, helping users optimize their productivity.
Mobile app offers the full Superhuman experience on iOS and Android devices for on-the-go productivity.

faqs.question: What makes Superhuman different from other email clients?
faqs.answer: Superhuman uses AI to prioritize emails, suggest responses, and automate tasks, offering a faster and more intuitive experience than traditional clients like Gmail or Outlook.

faqs.question: Is Superhuman compatible with my existing email provider?
faqs.answer: Yes, Superhuman integrates seamlessly with Gmail, Google Workspace, and Outlook, allowing users to manage their existing accounts within its interface.

faqs.question: Does Superhuman offer a free plan or trial?
faqs.answer: Superhuman does not offer a free plan but provides a 30-day money-back guarantee for new users to try its premium features.

faqs.question: How does Superhuman improve email productivity?
faqs.answer: By using AI to prioritize emails, suggest replies, and automate workflows, Superhuman helps users process emails up to twice as fast as traditional clients.

faqs.question: Can teams use Superhuman for collaborative email management?
faqs.answer: Yes, Superhuman offers team features like shared inboxes and real-time collaboration tools to streamline group workflows.

faqs.question: Is Superhuman available on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, Superhuman has dedicated iOS and Android apps, delivering the same powerful features as the desktop version.

faqs.question: How secure is Superhuman for handling sensitive emails?
faqs.answer: Superhuman uses enterprise-grade encryption and complies with industry standards to ensure the security of users' email data.
